definitions.definition: Any of various breeds of dog used for herding sheep ; an individual of such a breed.
Any of various breeds of dog used for guarding sheep; an individual of such a breed.
A chaperon ; an adult who accompanies other people in a supervisory role.

main_definition: Any of various breeds of dog used for herding sheep ; an individual of such a breed.
secondary_definitions: Any of various breeds of dog used for guarding sheep; an individual of such a breed.
( slang , dated ) A chaperon ; an adult who accompanies other people in a supervisory role.
( US , slang , law enforcement ) A police officer .
